alert.note: Alert for Carter; Garvin; Jefferson; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 23 at 11:29PM CDT until April 24 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...SOUTH CENTRAL GARVIN...SOUTHEASTERN STEPHENS AND WESTERN CARTER COUNTIES... At 1129 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Loco, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Healdton, Wilson, Comanche, Ringling, Velma, Tatums, Loco, Ratliff City, Addington, Graham, Pooleville, Cornish, Fox and Pernell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
